# f5distributedcloud_waf_exclusion_policy (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud WAF Exclusion Policy. WAF Exclusion Policies define exceptions to WAF rules.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the WAF Exclusion Policy.
- `namespace` (String) The namespace in which to create the WAF Exclusion Policy.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the WAF Exclusion Policy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the WAF Exclusion Policy.
